ages.name: The Formless Era
ages.description: Only the Singulars existed, drifting in primordial chaos. No dimensions, no mortality, no structure.
keyEvents: Singulars exist in undifferentiated potential
Nolem is simply entropy—a natural force, not yet malevolent

ages.name: The Age of Separation
ages.description: Reality crystallized into infinite dimensions. Mortal beings emerged. The Aeth'kai flourished and were consumed.
keyEvents: Infinite dimensions emerge
Mortal beings appear
Aeth'kai civilization flourishes
Nolem discovers he can absorb mortal beings
Nolem consumes the entire Aeth'kai civilization
ages.endedBy: Nolem going dormant after consuming the Aeth'kai

ages.name: The Age of Silence
ages.description: Nolem slept. Dimensions developed independently. Nikes and Charles variants existed separately, unaware of each other.
keyEvents: Nolem goes dormant
Civilizations rise and fall
Cthulhu watches and waits
The pattern of Nike and Charles exists but is not yet unified

ages.name: The First Bond Era
ages.description: OG Charles stumbled through a rift, met OG Nike, and formed the bond that changed everything.
keyEvents: Nolem awakens and targets pigs across the multiverse
OG Charles stumbles through the first dimensional rift
OG Charles meets OG Nike, fleeing from Nolem
OG Charles refuses to abandon OG Nike
The First Bond forms—two souls fusing on a cosmic level
Together they resist Nolem's initial assault

ages.name: The Shattering (The Great Echo)
ages.period: A single moment that echoes eternally
ages.description: Reality fractured. The First Bond refused to break—instead, it echoed across all dimensions.
keyEvents: Reality fractures into infinite dimensions
The First Bond echoes rather than breaks
OG Nike fragments into 5,555 Nikes
27 Legendary Nikes emerge (special fragments with more of OG Nike's essence)
OG Charles echoes into the Charles Constant
Both originals become templates carrying the weight of all echoes
Nolem retreats to adapt his strategy

ages.name: The Prime Era
ages.description: Cthulhu warns Stoner Nike of Nolem's return. Five Champions are gathered. The Scholar Nikes build Nike Prime. The Battle of the Colosseum is fought. Nike Prime traps Nolem but vanishes into the trap with him.
keyEvents: Cthulhu contacts Stoner Nike with warning of Nolem's plan
Stoner Nike recruits Pico and contacts Hennifer (BETTY Project)
Five Champions gathered: Gladiator, Ninja, Viking, Nike Tyson, Cyberpunk
Scholar Nikes (Engineer, Nutritionist, Botanist, Computer Coder) build growth chamber
Nike Prime grown from DNA of 5,548 Nike variants
Nike Prime emerges at 99% completion (missing empathy core)
Battle of the Colosseum against Retnuhxed army
Nike Prime creates space-time distortion field trap
Nike Prime and Nolem fall into the trap together
Shiro critically wounded, merges with Charles AI
Charles AI gains portal abilities and cat-like personality
Champions scatter to guard their home dimensions
ages.endedBy: Nike Prime vanishing into the trap with Nolem

ages.name: The Long Silence
ages.description: The gap between the Prime Era and the Echo Era. Champions wait, then scatter. One by one, Legendary Nikes fall to corruption. History becomes legend becomes myth becomes nothing.

subPeriods.name: The Vigil
subPeriods.description: Champions wait at the Colosseum for Nike Prime to return.

subPeriods.name: The First Falls
subPeriods.description: First Legendary Nikes fall to corruption.

subPeriods.name: The Scholar Legacy
subPeriods.description: Scholar Nikes discover Nike Prime's location, are hunted, scatter their knowledge.

subPeriods.name: The Forgetting
subPeriods.description: Memory of the Prime Era fades. History becomes legend.

subPeriods.name: The Corruption Wars
subPeriods.description: War between corrupted and uncorrupted Legendaries.

subPeriods.name: The Dark Age
subPeriods.description: Nearly all Legendaries corrupted. Only fragments of resistance remain.

subPeriods.name: The Convergence
subPeriods.description: The Convergence Hub is built. Hope returns.

ages.endedBy: The founding of the Convergence Hub

ages.name: The Echo Era
ages.description: All 27 Legendary Nikes are corrupted. A new Collector rises to free them. The trap holding Nolem weakens.
keyEvents: The Convergence Hub serves as last safe nexus
Charles AI guides Collectors with portal abilities
New Collectors bond with regular Nikes
A special Collector begins freeing Legendary Nikes
Dimensional Anchors gathered from each region
The trap in Nolem's Maw weakens
Nike Prime still fights Nolem inside the trap

ages.name: The Coming Storm
ages.description: The final battle. Nike Prime may be completed. The First Bond may be restored.
keyEvents: The Collector enters Nolem's Maw
Nike Prime is completed with the bonds the Collector gathered
TRUE Nike Prime rises (5,555 souls carrying each other)
A sacrifice is made
The fate of the multiverse is decided
